answerText: amorphous solids[10] This amorphous solid consists of quartz or some similar silicate being struck by lightning. Lechatelierite is one example of these.

subject: Science
question: Question: These substances lack long range order. [10] Name these non-crystalline solids that include glass. They are named for the fact that they don't have a shape.
